description:
Preschoolers is the first Nintendo Switchâ„¢  children cartoon mixed with a color book. Listen to a story of a noisy neighbour who gets a well deserved lesson in humility. Join the Preschoolers on a heartwarming visit to the ZOO and learn why even rowdy monkeys and huge bears need a little peace and quiet.

After you watch the episodes, it's time for a different kind of fun. Pick one, of over twenty drawings and make them your own. These adorable characters, can't wait for you, to make their life more colorfull.

Key features:

- Full length cartoon episodes
- 8 tools with 24 color variations
- Cute designs
- Calming music track
- Freedom of expression
name: The Preschoolers: Season 1
